message: I'm excited to sell you this amazing product! I think it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to start with a price of $110.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I'm a bit hesitant about the price. I was thinking more along the lines of $90.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $100.
I appreciate the willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that price. I was thinking more along the lines of $95.
I'm not willing to go above $95, but I'm willing to make a small concession. I'm counteroffering at $105, which is still a good deal for you, considering the product's value to you is $120.
I think I can go a bit higher, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $98.
I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, but I'm still not willing to go below $110. I think it's a fair price considering the product's value to you is $120.
